raw_body: ALUWIHARE – DONA – Wife of Arjuna,​ mother of Ayomi,​ Dilmi,​ Shiromi and Rajeeva,​ sister of Rathna and late Dharme,​ mother-in-law of Ajith,​ Chanuka and Helene,​ grandmother of Amandha,​ Akith,​ Diya,​ Ajay,​ Seth and Anila. Private funeral in Colombo. Interment of ashes at the Aluwihare Family Burial Ground,​ Matale at 11 a.m. on 5th May 2024.027967
